title: Inside Mayweather vs. Paul: Miami | Part 2 | SHOWTIME PPV
author: SHOWTIME Sports
description:
INSIDE MAYWEATHER VS. PAUL: MIAMI takes you behind the scenes with both global superstars as they head into their blockbuster fight at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami. 

#MayweatherPaul is TONIGHT at 8PM ET/5PM PT. 

Order The Fight Now: https://s.sho.com/june6ppv

#SHOSports #MayweatherPaul #MayPaul #InsideMayPaul
